title: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, there is an issue where the ControlExampleText component emits a beeping sound when choosing SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unexpected.
OB: When I select SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText component, I don't hear any sound.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' sound (the bell sound that indicates an incorrect action) when I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText component.
SR:
1. Launch Build F1 (20020521) on Windows 2000. 
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample. 
3. Go to the Text tab. 
4. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE. 
5. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI again in the ControlExampleText component.
